page.title: 07FIRST CASTLEDERG CHURCH
page.content: The congregation of First Castlederg was established about the year {1700} on the suggestion of the Rev.W.Holmes of Urney, who believed that a good congregation could be formed. He allowed part of his own congregation to secede and these, with some of Mr Halliday's congregation at{ARDSTRAW,} to make up the numbers. The small Church has survived to this day, the present Minister being Rev.R.Neill. The church still has a small congregation and is characteristic of a small rural community.
